docs.snippet: China's top anti-graft watchdog said on Monday that a mechanism to keep officials in check independent of the Communist Party cannot exist in China, as it vowed to build a new supervision system to underpin President Xi Jinping's war on corruption...
docs.lead_paragraph: China's top anti-graft watchdog said on Monday that a mechanism to keep officials in check independent of the Communist Party cannot exist in China, as it vowed to build a new supervision system to underpin President Xi Jinping's war on corruption.

headline.main: Chinese Communist Party Rules Out 'Independent' Checks in Graft Fight

docs.snippet: Iraqi special forces made further advances against Islamic State in Mosul on Monday, pushing militants from another eastern district and edging closer to army units nearby, officers in the city said....

docs.snippet: The appeal of former Chad president Hissene Habre against his life sentence for war crimes, crimes against humanity and torture began Monday by the Extraordinary African Chambers, marking the final stage in a landmark case pursued by victims for m...
docs.lead_paragraph: The appeal of former Chad president Hissene Habre against his life sentence for war crimes, crimes against humanity and torture began Monday by the Extraordinary African Chambers, marking the final stage in a landmark case pursued by victims for more than 15 years.

headline.main: Ex-Chad Dictator Habre's Appeal Against Conviction Begins
headline.print_headline: Ex-Chad Dictator Habre's Appeal Against Conviction Begins

docs.snippet: Two separate attacks by suspected Boko Haram suicide bombers - one by a female duo, the other by three men - have killed three people in northeast Nigeria, police said on Monday. All the attackers died....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two separate attacks by suspected Boko Haram suicide bombers - one by a female duo, the other by three men - have killed three people in northeast Nigeria, police said on Monday. All the attackers died.

headline.main: Northeast Nigeria Bombers Kill Three in Weekend Violence Upsurge
headline.print_headline: Northeast Nigeria Bombers Kill Three in Weekend Violence Upsurge

docs.snippet: President-elect Donald Trump accepts the U.S. intelligence community's conclusion that Russia engaged in cyber attacks during the U.S. presidential election and may take action in response, his incoming chief of staff said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald Trump accepts the U.S. intelligence community's conclusion that Russia engaged in cyber attacks during the U.S. presidential election and may take action in response, his incoming chief of staff said on Sunday.

headline.main: Trump Acknowledges Russia Role in U.S. Election Hacking-Aide
headline.print_headline: Trump Acknowledges Russia Role in U.S. Election Hacking-Aide

docs.snippet: Allegations that Russia tried to influence the U.S. election in favour of Donald Trump amount to a witch-hunt, the Kremlin said on Monday, in its first reaction to the release of a U.S. intelligence report on the alleged Russian operation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Allegations that Russia tried to influence the U.S. election in favour of Donald Trump amount to a witch-hunt, the Kremlin said on Monday, in its first reaction to the release of a U.S. intelligence report on the alleged Russian operation.

headline.main: Kremlin Says U.S. Hacking Allegations Are 'Reminiscent of a Witch-Hunt'
headline.print_headline: Kremlin Says U.S. Hacking Allegations Are 'Reminiscent of a Witch-Hunt'

docs.snippet: A Swedish court found former national track and field team manager Ulf Karlsson guilty of aggravated libel against Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic on Monday for suggesting he used performance-enhancing substances....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Swedish court found former national track and field team manager Ulf Karlsson guilty of aggravated libel against Manchester United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic on Monday for suggesting he used performance-enhancing substances.

headline.main: Man United's Ibrahimovic Libelled by Ex-Athletics Manager-Swedish Court
